topic.title: Flushing a bucket
topic.shortdesc: This option deletes every object in a bucket.

body.p: Flush setting is used exclusively for one purpose: to enable your application to use the flush method and delete every object in the bucket.
It is used very rarely, and it is highly recommended that you never run with this setting enabled in production unless you absolutely must. It can be as dangerous as it sounds.
You can also use the commands the CLI command bucket-flush and REST API rest-bucket-flush.
